about_the_game:
**Once you obtain this DLC, log into Freestyle 2 and check your Gift Box. **
If you have failed to receive the item, please contact Freestyle 2 **

Freestyle2 - "FREE" 2 Package

DLC Content:

  • Coyote Character Coupon
  • Friends Kevin Coupon
  • 500 Event G-Kash

DLC Descriptions:
Free DLC Package on Freestyle 2!
A free DLC package for all players, whether new to Freestyle 2, returning after a break, or those who have been showing their love for Freestyle 2!
Enjoy Freestyle2 with Coyote and freinds Kevin!
You also can articipate in various events with 500 Event Gkash.

If you were not able to receive the DLC, please logout and login again.
if you still didn't get your DLC, please send us an Email.

Please follow the instruction in the Getting Started Manual. (** Guide images may contain a different package image)
Find the Getting Started Manual at Quick Reference. which is placed on the right hand side of the page.

name: Freestyle2 - "FREE" 2 Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.4 GHz
  • Graphics: GEFORCE 9800 GT 1GB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: A free DLC for all players, whether new to Freestyle 2, returning after a break, or those who have been showing their love for Freestyle 2! Enjoy Freestyle2 with Coyote and freinds Kevin! You also can articipate in various events with 500 Event Gkash.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Thai, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
